links: C. Banderier, J.-M. Le Bars and V. Ravelomanana, Generating functions for kernels of digraphs
formula: a(n) = (n-1)!*L(n), L(n) := A000032(n); E.g.f.: -log(1-x-x^2). Also a(n)/n! = sum(binomial(n-j, j)/(n-j), j=0..floor(n/2)).
crossrefs: a(n) = A039692(n, 1) (first column of Fibonacci Jabotinsky-triangle).
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
